147b2: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs
147b3: so/ / dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// lam
147b4: gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/
147b5: la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// ma nor ba de bzhin
147b6: nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba
147b7: yang mi dmigs so/ / chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi
147b8: dmigs so/ / chos kyi gnas nyid chos kyi gnas nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// chos skyon med pa nyid chos skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung

148a1: ba yang mi dmigs so/ / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
148a2: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/ de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa/ de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / dag
148a3: yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang mtshan yongs su dag pa
148a4: thob par gyur pa/ de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do// zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do// gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do// nga rgyal dang ldan pa
148a5: nga sgyu dang g.yo dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang / sred pa dang ldan pa dang lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do// 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed cing / zhe sdang dang gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang sgra dang g.yo dang
148a6: phrag dog dang ser sna dang zad pa dang lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed pas nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ khor zug rtag par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par
148a7: nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ nam bla na med pa yang
148a8: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / bral bar mi 'gyud ro// de bas na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'

148b1: sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang legs pa 'di dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la brtson 'grus mi gtang bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
148b2: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa le'u lnga pa'o//
148b3: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyi shu dgu pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
148b4: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te tshor ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te 'du shes la spyod na mtshan ma la
148b5: spong ngo do/ / gal te 'du byed la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
148b6: spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
148b7: mi mkhas pas gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mtha
148b8: pas gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs/

149a1: sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs
149a2: bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs bdag med
149a3: ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar
149a4: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
149a5: la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
149a6: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
149a7: 'das gal ta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor brtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal ta byang
149a8: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'

149b1: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
149b2: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
149b3: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
149b4: du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
149b5: spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
149b6: mi mkhas pas tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tsher
149b7: ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba mi dben zhes
149b8: bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na

150a1: mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na
150a2: mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
150a3: do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar skyed na mtshan ma la spyod
150a4: de/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
150a5: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
150a6: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
150a7: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
150a8: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal

150b1: byang chubs pas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas 'du shes mi dben zhes bkye bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
150b2: te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
150b3: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
150b4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
150b5: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
150b6: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
150b7: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
150b8: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

151a1: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
151a2: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
151a3: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
151a4: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
151a5: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpanga' chen po
151a6: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
151a7: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
151a8: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub

151b1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
151b2: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgro bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
151b3: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
151b4: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// /
151b5: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
151b6: spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// /
151b7: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
151b8: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom

152a1: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
152a2: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
152a3: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
152a4: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
152a5: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
152a6: te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
152a7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
152a8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'

152b1: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
152b2: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
152b3: thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
152b4: pas rna ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba bdag med ces
152b5: bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
152b6: spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnab ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
152b7: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'/
152b8: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab

153a1: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyid pa la
153a2: spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
153a3: pas sna bde zhes bgyi b.raspyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
153a4: sna sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna bdag ces
153a5: bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna bdag med ces bgyi bar
153a6: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
153a7: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
153a8: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub

153b1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
153b2: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
153b3: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
153b4: spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
153b5: mkhas pas lce sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
153b6: lce bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce bdag med ces bgyi
153b7: bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
153b8: spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

154a1: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bco
154a2: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
154a3: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
154a4: te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
154a5: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
154a6: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
154a7: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
154a8: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

154b1: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
154b2: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
154b3: phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
154b4: phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
154b5: pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
154b6: mkhas pas yid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid bde zhes
154b7: bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na
154b8: mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

155a1: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
155a2: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
155a3: te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems/
155a4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
155a5: po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
155a6: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
155a7: la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
155a8: thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas

155b1: gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
155b2: gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs
155b3: bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs pa zhes ba
155b4: bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
155b5: ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
155b6: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod par che/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs ma dben zhes brgya bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
155b7: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas startag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
155b8: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sgra mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

156a1: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas smra ba de zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pharol/
156a2: du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sgra sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
156a3: pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sgra bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
156a4: pas sgra bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas smra zhi zhes bgyi/
156a5: bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sgyu ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
156a6: ngo / / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs mi mkhas pas sgra dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
156a7: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sgra mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
156a8: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dri rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

156b1: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dri mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
156b2: du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dri bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
156b3: thabs mi mkhas pas dri sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
156b4: pas dri bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dri bdag med
156b5: ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dri zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod
156b6: na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dri ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
156b7: la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dri dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do//
156b8: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dri mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal

157a1: te byang chubasams dpa' sems dpa' can po gas rab bya pha rol du phyin pa la spyod ba'i ma/ thabs mi mkhas pas ro tag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bang
157a2: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ro ma rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
157a3: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ro bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
157a4: phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ro sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod/
157a5: pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ro bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
157a6: mi mkhas pas ro bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma
157a7: mkhas pas ro zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
157a8: ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ro dben zhes bgyi bar spyod

157b1: na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ro mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
157b2: do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
157b3: te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
157b4: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi tha
157b5: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
157b6: thabs mi mkhas pas reg bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg
157b7: bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod
157b8: na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

158a1: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
158a2: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
158a3: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos rtag ces bgyi bar stong na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
158a4: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
158a5: pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/
158a6: chos sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos bdag ces bgyi/
158a7: bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
158a8: spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das

158b1: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
158b2: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
158b3: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
158b4: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
158b5: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
158b6: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
158b7: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
158b8: po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/

159a1: po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
159a2: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
159a3: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
159a4: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
159a5: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
159a6: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
159a7: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
159a8: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

159b1: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
159b2: po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
159b3: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
159b4: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
159b5: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
159b6: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
159b7: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
159b8: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol

160a1: du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
160a2: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
160a3: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
160a4: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
160a5: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin//
160a6: pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
160a7: thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
160a8: sna'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa mi/

160b1: dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces
160b2: bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod
160b3: na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
160b4: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
160b5: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
160b6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
160b7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
160b8: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

161a1: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
161a2: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po sum bcu pa
161a3: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
161a4: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
161a5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
161a6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
161a7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
161a8: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems

161b1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
161b2: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
161b3: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
161b4: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
161b5: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra
161b6: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
161b7: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
161b8: phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du

162a1: byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
162a2: phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
162a3: phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
162a4: spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
162a5: pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
162a6: thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
162a7: thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
162a8: mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la smod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi

162b1: mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
162b2: mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
162b3: thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
162b4: thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
162b5: thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
162b6: thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
162b7: thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
162b8: thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod

163a1: nga'i cha/ thabs ma mkhas pas na pa'i 'dus te rag pa tagacas bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mal yod do// bcom ldan 'das gapa te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' can pa shes rab kyi par la dbyin pa la spang ba /
163a2: thabs mi mkhas pas na pa'i 'dus te reg pa me rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sad pa che/ thabs ma mkhas
163a3: bas na bar 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la stod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas ra ba'i 'du
163a4: te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus
163a5: reg pa par gcas bkye bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa la med pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ra ba'i 'das te ga pabangs
163a6: med ces brtse bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pazhi zhes bgyi bar
163a7: skyong na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa la spyod pa'i'i/ thabs mi mkhas pas na pa'i 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spod na mtshanas/
163a8: la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas na pa'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan

163b1: 'das gal te byang chubasams dpa' sems dpa' chan pa shes rab kya pha ral du phyin pa la snyed par cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas na ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyong do// bcom ldan 'das gas
163b2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi par lan byin pa la stong pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas pa'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces 'gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sams
163b3: dpa' sem pa dang chen pa shes ras par ma phyin pa la spyod pa ma/ thabasamam khas pam tha 'das te / pam gcam patha par stod namatshan ma 'i thod do// bcom ldan 'dasags bangan bsams pa'i sa ma
163b4: da' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la stod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lnga'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar gyud namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ra po shis
163b5: pha rol du phyin pa la srung ba'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas snga'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod namatshan ma la spyod da// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi bar 'du
163b6: na pa la snang ba 'i/ thabs mi mkhas pas snga'i 'das reg pa bdag tses bgyi bar gyung namacha ma la srung // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gapa kyi ba rol byed pa
163b7: spad pa'i ni/ thabs mi mkhas pas pa'i 'dus te reg pa padag med ces brtse bar sma namatshanas pa spod / bcom ldan 'das gas sa byang chubasams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rabakyi pa ro la phyin pa la
163b8: tsho/ thabs ma mkhas pas sna'i 'dus ga pazhizhes bkyi bar byed dmatshan ma mi byed do/ bcom ldan 'dasags te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rabatu pa la du byin pa la spyod pa'i ma/ thar du'i

164a1: mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs/
164a2: mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkha/
164a3: pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i
164a4: 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus//
164a5: te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg
164a6: pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa
164a7: sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg
164a8: pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa

164b1: bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar
164b2: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
164b3: spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan
164b4: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
164b5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
164b6: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
164b7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
164b8: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems/

165a1: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem
165a2: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
165a3: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
165a4: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pas zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
165a5: du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
165a6: spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
165a7: thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
165a8: pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi

165b1: 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
165b2: sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces
165b3: bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar
165b4: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
165b5: la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
165b6: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
165b7: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
165b8: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor brtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan

166a1: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
166a2: do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
166a3: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
166a4: spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod
166a5: na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces
166a6: bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher bzhi
166a7: zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
166a8: ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

166b1: gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te
166b2: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
166b3: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher brtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
166b4: mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
166b5: thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
166b6: pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
166b7: gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher rab bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
166b8: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems

167a1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
167a2: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
167a3: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
167a4: spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar
167a5: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces
167a6: bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
167a7: ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
167a8: gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te/

167b1: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mtha
167b2: pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs

167b4: pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
167b5: spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
167b6: du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
167b7: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems

168a1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
168a2: te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das

168a4: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la

168a7: zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus
168a8: te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i

168b1: 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
168b2: le'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mtha
