168b7: tshe thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
168b8: la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol

169a1: du phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang /
169a2: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'/
169a3: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
169a4: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
169a5: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
169a6: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
169a7: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
169a8: do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na

169b1: mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces
169b2: bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
169b3: tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te/
169b4: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
169b5: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
169b6: mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la/
169b7: spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
169b8: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

170a1: la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
170a2: pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
170a3: pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
170a4: pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
170a5: thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
170a6: thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
170a7: mi mkhas pas sa'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
170a8: mkhas pas sa'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas

170b1: sa'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i
170b2: khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams/
170b3: mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams bde zhes
170b4: bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi
170b5: bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar
170b6: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar
170b7: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
170b8: la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

171a1: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
171a2: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams me dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
171a3: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/
171a4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
171a5: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
171a6: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
171a7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
171a8: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

171b1: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
171b2: du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mo mkhas pas me'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
171b3: spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tha
171b4: mi mkhas pas me'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
171b5: pas rlung gi khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams
171b6: mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bde zhes

171b8: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na

172a1: mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod
172a2: na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// /
172a3: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
172a4: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/

172a6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
172a7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
172a8: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems

172b1: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems

172b5: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams ma ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
172b6: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
172b7: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
172b8: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab

173a1: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
173a2: po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
173a3: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

173a5: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag med ces brtse bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
173a6: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
173a7: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
173a8: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

173b1: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya
173b2: bam po sum bcu gcig pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
173b3: ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
173b4: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'dra
173b5: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
173b6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
173b7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
173b8: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

174a1: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
174a2: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
174a3: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin/
174a4: pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
174a5: tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
174a6: thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
174a7: mi mkhas pas 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
174a8: mkhas pas 'du byed bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed bdag med

174b1: ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas 'du byed zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
174b2: do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs me mkhas pas 'du byed ma zhe zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
174b3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
174b4: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed me dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
174b5: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
174b6: byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
174b7: pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
174b8: mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi

175a1: mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
175a2: mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas/
175a3: pas rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam
175a4: par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes
175a5: pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa mi
175a6: dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs rtag
175a7: ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi/
175a8: bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar

175b1: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi
175b2: bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs bdag ces
175b3: bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs bdag med/
175b4: ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs zhi
175b5: zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs ma zhi
175b6: zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs dben zhes
175b7: bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs mi dben zhes//
175b8: bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug rtag ces bgyi bar

176a1: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod
176a2: na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
176a3: la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
176a4: ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
176a5: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
176a6: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das//
176a7: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
176a8: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te

176b1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
176b2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
176b3: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
176b4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
176b5: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
176b6: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
176b7: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
176b8: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/

177a1: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa mazhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
177a2: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
177a3: du byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
177a4: phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la smod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
177a5: pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
177a6: thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi//
177a7: mkhas pas tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
177a8: mkhas pas tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas//

177b1: tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/
177b2: tsher bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar
177b3: sbyong na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tsher rab dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
177b4: spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das/

177b6: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
177b7: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol

178a1: spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la

178a3: mi mkhas pas sred pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred
178a4: pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa dben zhes

178a6: mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
178a7: spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
178a8: de/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyad na mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom

178b1: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do// bcom ldan

179a1: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
179a2: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi ba
179a3: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
179a4: du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
179a5: la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
179a6: pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
179a7: mi mkhas pas srid pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas

180a1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
180a2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
180a3: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
180a4: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
180a5: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
180a6: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
180a7: na ra na pa'i da/ 6 ljin sa zung na sa sa dmas sa na sa
180a8: byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

180b1: la smod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
180b2: thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
180b3: mkhas pas rga shi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi
180b4: mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs me mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
180b5: rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin
180b6: pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
180b7: bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sdug
180b8: bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa

181a1: bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i
181a2: pha rol du phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i
181a3: pha rol du phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha
181a4: rol du phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i
181a5: pha rol du phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i
181a6: pha rol du phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrim
181a7: kyi pha rol du phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims
181a8: kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshul

181b1: khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
181b2: pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
181b3: pa'i tshe/ zabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
181b4: du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
181b5: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
181b6: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
181b7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
181b8: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

182a1: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na
182a2: mkhan ma la spyad do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mi rtag ces bkyi
182a3: bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar
182a4: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes
182a5: bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bdag
182a6: ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bdag
182a7: med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol
182a8: du phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas

182b1: bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
182b2: mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
182b3: pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
182b4: tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
182b5: po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod no mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
182b6: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem
182b7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la stong ngo // bcom ldan
182b8: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas papa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la

183a1: spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa bdag
183a2: med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi
183a3: pha rol du phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
183a4: pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
183a5: pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
183a6: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
183a7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan//
183a8: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na

183b1: mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha
183b2: rol du phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
183b3: bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
183b4: thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
183b5: thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
183b6: pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
183b7: tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
183b8: pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

184a1: la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab tu
184a2: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
184a3: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
184a4: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
184a5: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
184a6: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
184a7: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
184a8: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems

184b1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
184b2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
184b3: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
184b4: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
184b5: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
184b6: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
184b7: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
184b8: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du

185a1: phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
185a2: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
185a3: phyin pa la spyong ba'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
185a4: pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
185a5: ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
185a6: la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
185a7: tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
185a8: thabs mi mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs/

185b1: mi mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
185b2: mi mkhas pas phyi stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
185b3: pas phyi stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
185b4: pas phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
185b5: phyi stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi
185b6: stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi stong pa
185b7: nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang
185b8: stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong

186a1: pa nyid mi rtag ces bkye bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas phyinang
186a2: stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi na stong pa
186a3: nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyi
186a4: bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag
186a5: med ces bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi
186a6: bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar
186a7: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar
186a8: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phye nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes

186b1: bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa
186b2: nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong
186b3: pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas song
186b4: pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa
186b5: nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong
186b6: pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa
186b7: nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa
186b8: nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid

187a1: bzhi zhes bgyi bar spong na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben
187a2: zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dben
187a3: zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar
187a4: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
187a5: ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la song
187a6: do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
187a7: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
187a8: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das

187b1: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po slong pa nyid gi zhes bgyi bar spyod namachan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chung/
187b2: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
187b3: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
187b4: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
187b5: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
187b6: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
187b7: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
187b8: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

188a1: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
188a2: po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
188a3: po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
188a4: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
188a5: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
188a6: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po sam bcu gnyis pa/
188a7: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// /
188a8: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

188b1: bcom ldan 'das gal ta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la stong pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod dam na pa la sung ga/
188b2: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal nas bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod do//
188b3: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
188b4: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
188b5: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
188b6: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
188b7: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// ba
188b8: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid me dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom

189a1: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/
189a2: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
189a3: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
189a4: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
189a5: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom//
189a6: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
189a7: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
189a8: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das

189b1: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
189b2: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
189b3: te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
189b4: te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
189b5: te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/
189b6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
189b7: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
189b8: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

190a1: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na
190a2: mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar
190a3: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
190a4: dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong
190a5: pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tham
190a6: med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas thog
190a7: pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
190a8: mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//

190b1: thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
190b2: la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab tu
190b3: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
190b4: po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
190b5: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
190b6: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
190b7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
190b8: te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te

191a1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
191a2: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de// bcom
191a3: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
191a4: do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
191a5: ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod
191a6: na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi
191a7: bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi
191a8: zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa

191b1: nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong/
191b2: pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa
191b3: nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin
191b4: stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la smod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong
191b5: pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid
191b6: sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid
191b7: bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag
191b8: med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes

192a1: bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes
192a2: bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi
192a3: bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar
192a4: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar
192a5: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar
192a6: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar
192a7: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi
192a8: bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na/

192b1: mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag me de ces bgyi bar spyod na ma
192b2: ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
192b3: do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
192b4: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
192b5: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
192b6: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
192b7: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
192b8: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan

193a1: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
193a2: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
193a3: ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
193a4: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'dra/
193a5: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
193a6: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
193a7: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
193a8: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
