313a8: bka' stsal pa/ / rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

313b1: stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems// tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
313b2: stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// /
313b3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
313b4: lha ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin
313b5: snga ma 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
313b6: ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
313b7: de ji snyam du sems/ / mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
313b8: stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//

314a1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
314a2: 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin
314a3: snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu
314a4: sa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
314a5: kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ snying rje chen po
314a6: yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
314a7: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
314a8: thul pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// /

314b1: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi bcu gcig pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid
314b2: kyang gzugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags// sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'du shes kyang gzhan
314b3: ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du shes nyid kyang sgra mi sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dra shes so// bcom ldan 'das 'dri byed kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
314b4: 'du byed nyid kyang sgra ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu
314b5: ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig nyid kyang smra ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go/ bcom ldan 'das rno ba yid
314b6: gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sna yang gzhan ma lags// sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna nyid kyang
314b7: sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'o/ / bcom ldan 'das lce yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lci'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyang gzhan
314b8: legs/ / sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lus so// bcom ldan 'das yid kyang gzhan mi lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/

315a1: yid nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom
315a2: ldan 'das sgra yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sgra nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sla'o// bcom ldan 'das dri yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
315a3: nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dri'o// bcom ldan 'das ro yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ro nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang ro'o// bcom ldan 'das reg
315a4: kyang gzhan ma legs/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ reg nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang reg go// bcom ldan 'das chos rnams kyang gzhan ma lags// sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
315a5: lags te/ chos nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so// bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam par shes
315a6: pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i rnam par
315a7: shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
315a8: sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'o rnam par shes pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/

315b1: sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma
315b2: skye ma nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu
315b3: ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
315b4: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o//
315b5: bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan
315b6: 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
315b7: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyum yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
315b8: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mi nyid kyang yod kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg gi /

316a1: gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang snum/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
316a2: bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyum yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus
316a3: te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags// sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang
316a4: sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te
316a5: rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ / sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
316a6: gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
316a7: tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dres te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das
316a8: sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang snum sgyu ma nyid kyang sa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan

316b1: ma lags te/ rku'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chu'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ me'i khams nyid kyang sla ma sgyu ma nyid
316b2: kyang me'i khams so/ / bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma logs/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// bcom ldan 'dis ni ma ma'i
316b3: khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags
316b4: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags
316b5: ti/ ma rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do// bcom ldan 'das
316b6: rnam par shes pa yang gzhan mi lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags
316b7: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ra// sgyu ma nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das skye mched drug kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ skye mched drug
316b8: nyid kyang snu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ bcom ldan 'das reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba

317a1: yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sred pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sred pa
317a2: nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sred pa'o// bcom ldan 'das len pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ len pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang len pa'o// bcom ldan 'das srid pa yang
317a3: gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das skye ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ skye ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma
317a4: nyid kyang skye ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rga shi yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rga shi nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rga shi'o// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan
317a5: ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan ma
317a6: lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan ma
317a7: lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan ma
317a8: lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan/

317b1: ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan ma
317b2: lags/ sna ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan mo lags/ sgyu ma yang /
317b3: gzhan ma legs te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang
317b4: sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do//
317b5: bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das chen
317b6: po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lag
317b7: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dras byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan pa
317b8: legs te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te

318a1: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
318a2: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags
318a3: te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags
318a4: te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang smra ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang bzhin stong pa
318a5: nyid kyang sgyu ma/ ska ma nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang sku
318a6: ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma
318a7: sgyu ma nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
318a8: kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sna ma nyid kyang

318b1: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ nga ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//
318b2: bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i
318b3: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dran pa nye bar
318b4: gzhag pa rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yang dag par spong
318b5: ba rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sku mi nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so//
318b6: bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dbang po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyang gzhan
318b7: ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lagra
318b8: te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma

319a1: lags te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan
319a2: ma lags/ sna ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma lags
319a3: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lagra/
319a4: te/ tshad med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgra ma yang gzhan ma lags
319a5: te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan
319a6: ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang
319a7: gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan
319a8: 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon

319b1: pa med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
319b2: lags te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid
319b3: kyang sgra ma sgyu ma nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma lags// sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang smra
319b4: ma sna ma nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma sna
319b5: ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sna ma nyid kyang mi
319b6: 'jigs pa rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang so so yang dag
319b7: par rig pa rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang sna ma sgyu ma nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgya
319b8: kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bcom

320a1: ldan 'das rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ b+h+ra ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan
320a2: 'das lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das
320a3: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid
320a4: kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te
320a5: rang byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang byang chub po// bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma
320a6: sgyu ma nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma
320a7: sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
320a8: ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis

320b1: so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du
320b2: byin pa la slob par 'gyur rab/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom
320b3: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes dang / brda dang gdags pa dang tha snyad du bya
320b4: ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes dang brda dang gdags pa dang tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar
320b5: len pa'i phung po lnga po skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
320b6: stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing brda' med pa dang gdags pa med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus
320b7: kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa deste/
320b8: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni

321a1: 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
321a2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/ shes
321a3: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o/ / de ci'i
321a4: slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga
321a5: po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
321a6: 'das de 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
321a7: de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
321a8: de ni mi 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom

321b1: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
321b2: ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar sna ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni
321b3: dmigs su ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa
321b4: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i
321b5: rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig yor lta bu'i phung po lnga
321b6: po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe
321b7: na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar mig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
321b8: sul pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chu zla lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram

322a1: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni
322a2: dmigs su ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ smig rgyu lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams
322a3: cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar smig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos
322a4: po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
322a5: bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis
322a6: pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/ tsher ba ni rmi lam lta
322a7: bya/ 'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir
322a8: mi dmigs so/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong

322b1: pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha
322b2: ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang
322b3: gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
322b4: so/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du byed ni sgyu ma lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma
322b5: lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
322b6: dmigs so/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmis
322b7: so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong
322b8: pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//

323a1: dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
323a2: nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ tshor ba ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ 'du byed ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ rnam par
323a3: shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// byi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong
323a4: pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas
323a5: stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
323a6: dmigs so/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong
323a7: pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
323a8: rab 'byor gzugs ni mig yor lta bu/ tshor ba ni mig yor lta bu/ 'dra shes ni mig yor lta bu/ 'du byed ni mig yor lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni mig yor lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang

323b1: yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ / de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// byi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
323b2: kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
323b3: dmigs so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
323b4: kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med
323b5: pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni chu zla lta bu/ tshar ba ni chu zla
323b6: lta bu/ 'du shes ni chu zla lta bu/ 'du byed ni chu zla lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir
323b7: mi dmigs so/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang spyod pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa
323b8: stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog

324a1: ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs/
324a2: so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni smig rgya lta bu/ tshor ba ni smig rgyu lta bu/ 'du shes
324a3: ni smig rgyu lta bu/ 'du byed ni smig rgyu lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni smig rgya lta bu de/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
324a4: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
324a5: phyir mi dmigs so/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi
324a6: dmigs pa stong panyid kyi byir mi dmigs so/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi byir ba dmigs so// de ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'byor dis sted dper na gdugs ni smras pa ga/ 'or ba ni stsal ba lta bu/
324a7: 'du shes ni sprul pa lta bu// bar byed ni sprul pa lta bu// rnam par shes pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
324a8: so/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir

324b1: mi dmigs so/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
324b2: so/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/
324b3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos nas 'jigs shing sdang ba dang skrag par mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bga' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la
324b4: gsar du zhugs pa yang yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag du yang ma 'ongs na 'jigs shing sdang ba dang skrag par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
324b5: bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs mi sngar mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
324b6: 'a dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mi dag ces bya bar dog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba medag ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so/ 'du shes midag ces bya bar rtog sted mi darigs so// 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa
324b7: mertag ces bya bar rtog sde de mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
324b8: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs sdugabasngal zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs

325a1: so/ / tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so//
325a2: rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//
325a3: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs bdag med
325a4: ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so/ / tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi
325a5: dmigs so/ / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas
325a6: pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs zhi zhes bya
325a7: bar rtog te de mi dmigs so/ / tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa
325a8: zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang

325b1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs
325b2: so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes stong zhes bya
325b3: bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
325b4: rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
325b5: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis// gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste de ma
325b6: dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes
325b7: mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
325b8: pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod

326a1: pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
326a2: gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
326a3: nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste de
326a4: mi dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
326a5: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
326a6: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya//
326a7: bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
326a8: sems kyis/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog/

326b1: ste de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thebs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she
326b2: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
326b3: tshor ba dben zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
326b4: pa'i sems kyis/ / 'du byed dben zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
326b5: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
326b6: byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas// gzugs mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
326b7: yid la bya bas/ / tshor ba mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam
326b8: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag

327a1: pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//
327a2: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas//
327a3: gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshe rab sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par
327a4: byed de de mi dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad
327a5: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
327a6: rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
327a7: pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
327a8: ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ / gzugs bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba bdag

327b1: med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas// 'du shes bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi
327b2: dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad
327b3: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ / rnam par shes pa bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
327b4: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
327b5: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la bya
327b6: bas/ tshor ba zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi
327b7: dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang

328a1: ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes ba zhi pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
328a2: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
328a3: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
328a4: tshor ba stod pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de
328a5: mi dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad
328a6: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la zla bas/ rnam par shes pa stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub
328a7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

328b1: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs
328b2: par byed de de mi dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs
328b3: so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'dre shes mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams
328b4: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
328b5: dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
328b6: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
328b7: rba byin pa la spyod pa'oH/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i med la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed da de mi dmigs

329a1: so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so//
329a2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams
329a3: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
329a4: pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// / rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems
329a5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
329a6: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas// gzugs mngon par 'du
329a7: pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/

329b1: tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
329b2: 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas//
329b3: 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
329b4: rnam par shes par mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
329b5: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
329b6: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed
329b7: de mi dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so//

330a1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
330a2: nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes
330a3: pa dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//
330a4: ye d+harmA te tu pra b+ha ba he tun te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsA yo ni ro d+ha e bam+b+ha dI ma hA shra ma NaH// sarba bA bas+yA ka ra NaM/ ku sha la s+yo pa sam+ba daM/ sra tsit+taM pa ri da ma nu/ me tang+kud+d+hA nu shA sa naM
